# finetune-sagemaker-demo

This model is a fine-tuned version of [google/flan-t5-small](https://huggingface.co/google/flan-t5-small) on the samsum dataset.
It achieves the following results on the evaluation set:
- Loss: 1.7839
- Rouge1: 37.9541
- Rouge2: 13.3509
- Rougel: 30.3028
- Rougelsum: 35.1596
- Gen Len: 17.06

## Training procedure

### Training hyperparameters

The following hyperparameters were used during training:
- learning_rate: 5e-05
- train_batch_size: 32
- eval_batch_size: 64
- seed: 42
- optimizer: Adam with betas=(0.9,0.999) and epsilon=1e-08
- lr_scheduler_type: linear
- lr_scheduler_warmup_steps: 500
- num_epochs: 1

### Training results

| Training Loss | Epoch | Step | Validation Loss | Rouge1  | Rouge2  | Rougel  | Rougelsum | Gen Len |
|:-------------:|:-----:|:----:|:---------------:|:-------:|:-------:|:-------:|:---------:|:-------:|
| No log        | 1.0   | 16   | 1.7839          | 37.9541 | 13.3509 | 30.3028 | 35.1596   | 17.06   |


### Framework versions

- Transformers 4.26.0
- Pytorch 1.13.1+cu117
- Datasets 2.9.0
- Tokenizers 0.13.2
